caption: In an indoor billiard room, two women sat on a sofa chatting. A man in a hospital room received a bottle of water. A waiter served food in a restaurant. There was a woman painting, another woman practicing yoga. One woman entered a store. Four women gathered on a sofa inside the store, having drinks. A boy and a girl sat at desks, with the boy holding a book. The scene returned to the four women from earlier, and a woman in black clothing walked out while talking on the phone. Next to a car, there was a woman dressed in purple, and a man approached.
